remarks:
An alternate way of defining existential uniqueness.  Definition 6.10 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 26.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 2-Dec-2018.) 

---

 An alternate way of defining existential uniqueness.  Definition 6.10 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 26.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-1994.)
statement:
eu2.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
eu2 $p |- ( E! x ph <-> ( E. x ph /\ A. x A. y ( ( ph /\ [ y / x ] ph ) -> x = y ) ) ) $.
$d x y $.
